Question
========

Which random variable X is **not** a discrete variable? \ I A soccer team plays 12 games in a given season. Suppose X is the number of games that this team won.™ II A woman buys a lottery ticket every week in which the probability of winning of 1 euro is 1/10. Suppose X is her winnings after one year.Ê III A student waits for a bus to pass by every ten minutes. Suppose X is the number of minutes he waits at the bus stop.

Answerlist
----------

* I is not a discrete variable.
* II is not a discrete variable.
* III is not a discrete variable.
* All of them are not discrete variables.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I is not a discrete variable Incorrect
* II is not a discrete variable...: Incorrect
* III is not a discrete variable...: Correct
* All of them are not discrete variables...: Incorrect
